name: Town of Salem
blurb: Inspired by the party games Werewolf and Mafia, Town of Salem is a game of murder, mystery and deception.

rewards.reward: CONTRIBUTOR: Contributing grants exclusive access to our Alpha and Beta testing. You will get an in-game tag of <Contributor> that displays above your character and on the forums. Also a big thank you for supporting Town of Salem!\r\n\r\nA pledge of any amount will have your name added to our Thank You page on the website.
BENEFACTOR: Unlocks a unique house that you can choose. You also get the in-game tag <Benefactor> that displays above your character and on the forums.

SPONSOR: Unlocks the winter town map which comes with unique house artwork for all of the snow! Also comes with the unique house from the previous reward. The in-game tag of <Sponsor> will be displayed above your character and on the forums.
DONOR: Unlocks a special character you can choose. Also comes with the winter town map and the unique house. You also get the in-game tag <Donor> that displays above your character and on the forums.

PHILANTHROPIST: Unlocks an item that will grant you a 75% chance to be your favorite role. This item has unlimited uses. Love being the Serial Killer or the Godfather? This one's for you! Also comes with the winter map, unique character and house.\r\n\r\nThe in-game tag of <Philanthropist> will be displayed above your character and on the forums.

HUMANITARIAN: Unlocks the ability to customize your in-game name with unique colors and fonts. Careful, this may get you a lot of attention! Also comes with all previous rewards.\r\n\r\nThe in-game tag of <Humanitarian> will be displayed above your character and on the forums.

PATRON: You get a custom death animation! Instead of being lynched you will be shot by a firing squad of other town members. Also your account will have access to all future assets and features. This means all future characters, houses, maps and special features will always be available to you free of charge. Grants the achievement "Guardian Angel". Also comes with all previous rewards. The in-game tag of <Patron> will be displayed above your character and on the forums.

LEGEND: You and your friends can play a series of games with the programmer and designer of Town of Salem over Skype. Contribute your ideas on new features, maps, houses, characters and roles. You may see your idea added to the game!  Unlocks the achievement "Guardian Angel". Comes with all previous rewards. The in-game tag of <Legend> will be displayed above your character and on the forums.

BENEVOLENT: You will be the only person in the world with the <Benevolent> name tag. Your name will also be added to the list of random names that are chosen from in the game. You also unlock the "Kickstarter" achievement. Comes with all previous rewards. The in-game tag of <Benevolent> will be displayed above your character and on the forums.

ICONIC: Our character artist will "cartoonify" you inside the game. Send us a picture of yourself and you will be turned into a character in the game! You will be the only person in the world with the <Iconic> name tag. You also unlock the "Kickstarter" achievement. Your name will also be added to the list of random names that are chosen from in the game. Comes with all previous rewards. The in-game tag of <Iconic> will be displayed above your character and on the forums.
